Package fr.umlv.zen5

Interface ApplicationContext


  • public interface ApplicationContext
    Provided by the application framework, this object allows to render a graphic code into the drawing area of the application and to wait/ask for a pointer event.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void exit​(int exitStatus)
      Exit the application.
      ScreenInfo getScreenInfo​()
      Returns screen information.
      Event pollEvent​()
      Returns the first event since either the application was started or pollEvent()/pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called.
      Event pollOrWaitEvent​(long timeout)
      Returns the first event since either the application was started or pollEvent()/pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called.
      void renderFrame​(java.util.function.Consumer<java.awt.Graphics2D> consumer)
      Render a whole frame of the game in one call.

    • Method Detail

      • getScreenInfo

        ScreenInfo getScreenInfo​()
        Returns screen information.
        Returns:
        screen information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.

      • exit

        void exit​(int exitStatus)
        Exit the application.
        Parameters:
        exitStatus - the exit status. By convention, a nonzero status code indicates abnormal termination.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.

      • pollEvent

        Event pollEvent​()
        Returns the first event since either the application was started or pollEvent()/pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called. This method returns immediately.
        Returns:
        an event or null if no event happens.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.

      • pollOrWaitEvent

        Event pollOrWaitEvent​(long timeout)
        Returns the first event since either the application was started or pollEvent()/pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called. This method waits until a event occurs.
        Parameters:
        timeout - maximum time to wait (in milliseconds).
        Returns:
        an event or null if the timeout is elapsed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.

      • renderFrame

        void renderFrame​(java.util.function.Consumer<java.awt.Graphics2D> consumer)
        Render a whole frame of the game in one call. Because this method tries to use the hardware acceleration, the content of the screen is stored in the graphic card VRAM and may disappear at any moment. If the content of the screen is lost the parameter contentLost of the consumer taken as argument will be true.
        Parameters:
        consumer - a consumer that will be called perhaps several times to render the current frame.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this method is not called by the application thread.
